about.description1: Welcome to a world where megacorporations lose control and artificial intelligence breaks free from its creators. In Cyber Police: Synthetic Rebellion, you'll find yourself at the heart of a digital war: track down replicants, investigate crimes, and fight for survival in the neon jungle of the metropolis.
about.description2: The game combines Mafia mechanics, deep tactical decisions, and a dark cyberpunk setting. Each role has unique abilities, while hacker attacks and viruses can turn the tide of the game. Even after death, your character can continue to influence the game using digital traces and hidden manipulations.

whatIs.question: What is Cyber Police?
whatIs.answer: Cyber Police is a social deduction game where players must identify replicants, investigate cybercrimes, and fight for survival on the neon streets of the metropolis.

howToPlay.question: How do I play?
howToPlay.answer: Players form theories, accuse each other, use private chats.

roles.question: What are the roles?
roles.answer: Players don't know who is a Replicant and who is human

winning.question: How long does a game last?
winning.answer: About 20-30 minutes for an average group of 8-10 people.

mobile.question: Will there be a mobile version?
mobile.answer: Yes, a cross-platform implementation is planned.

systemRequirements.question: What are the system requirements?
systemRequirements.answer: Only a browser is needed (MVP version) or a lightweight client, details to follow.

howToJoin.question: How to join?
howToJoin.answer: You can join the game by subscribing to the project or by finding us in the Telegram channel.

no-voice.question: Can I play without voice?
no-voice.answer: Yes, but it's not recommended. The game is designed to be played in voice chat.

day.title: Day Phase
day.description: Discuss with other players and gather information. Use this time to share your findings and form alliances.

night.title: Night Phase
night.description: Special abilities can be used during the night. Choose your actions carefully.

voting.title: Voting Phase
voting.description: Vote to eliminate a suspected Replicant. Choose wisely - the fate of the city depends on it.

preparation.title: Game Preparation
preparation.description: Players are assigned secret roles as either Cyber Police or Syndicate Replicants. Each role has unique abilities that can be used during the game.

dayPhase.title: Day Phase: Investigation
dayPhase.description: During the day, all players discuss, share information, and try to identify the Replicants. Use private chats and digital tools to gather intelligence.

nightPhase.title: Night Phase: Covert Operations
nightPhase.description: At night, Replicants choose their targets while the Cyber Police use their abilities to protect citizens and gather evidence.

votingPhase.title: Voting Phase: Justice
votingPhase.description: Players vote to eliminate a suspected Replicant. Be careful - the Syndicate can hack the voting system to manipulate results.

roles.title: Game Roles
roles.description: Each player is secretly assigned one of these roles at the start of the game. Use your abilities wisely to help your team win.

detective.name: Neural Detective
detective.description: A seasoned investigator with advanced neural implants for detecting Replicants
detective.abilities: Can scan one player per night to determine if they are a Replicant
detective.lore: You are one of the best detectives in the city. Your neural implants allow you to see hidden connections and detect Replicants even in the most complex cases
detective.tips: Use scanning to find out which players might be Replicants. But remember that some players may be craftier than they appear

abilitySides.cyberPolice: Can scan one player per night to determine if they are a Replicant

punisher.name: Punisher
punisher.description: Combat implant owner who can destroy other players' implants
punisher.abilities: The Punisher uses combat implants to destroy another player's implant by correctly naming their role. If wrong, the Punisher dies instead
punisher.lore: A former military operative who happened to be in the hotel and managed to restore access to their implant
punisher.tips: Use social deduction to figure out the victim's role. Listen to players with information roles, they may know more

abilitySides.cyberPolice: At a crucial moment, the Punisher can destroy a replicant's implant to help the peaceful city
abilitySides.replicants: As a replicant, the Punisher knows more about players' roles. The cyber police are the easiest target

votingHacker.name: Voting Hacker
votingHacker.description: A voting protocol expert. Can manipulate voting results in their favor.
votingHacker.abilities: Once per game can 'steal' a vote from a chosen player, adding it to themselves.
votingHacker.lore: The corporation has repeatedly used your services to hack the voting system. You've become an expert in voting protocols.
votingHacker.tips: Use your ability wisely, as your victim will know they couldn't vote as they wanted

abilitySides.cyberPolice: Steal votes from suspected replicants to prevent them from using voting in their favor
abilitySides.replicants: Steal votes from peaceful citizens to prevent them from voting against replicants

saboteur.name: Saboteur
saboteur.description: The Saboteur can use their abilities to prevent other players from using their abilities
saboteur.abilities: Can use their ability at night to prevent abilities from being used the following night
saboteur.lore: An implant expert who knows how to suppress their operation
saboteur.tips: Very useful role in critical situations, can always help avoid kills and limit the ability to get new information

abilitySides.cyberPolice: The Saboteur can save a player from death by preventing abilities and kills at night
abilitySides.replicants: The Saboteur can limit the ability to get new information about replicants

cyberEngineer.name: Cyber Engineer
cyberEngineer.description: The Cyber Engineer can save a player from death by preventing their destruction at night
cyberEngineer.abilities: Each night chooses a player to save from death. If saved - their ability no longer works
cyberEngineer.lore: Their implant forms a protective field, but unfortunately it can only work once
cyberEngineer.tips: Use social deduction to find the most valuable player and save them from night killing

abilitySides.cyberPolice: The Cyber Engineer can save a player from death by preventing their destruction at night. Especially good at protecting cyber police
abilitySides.replicants: The Cyber Engineer can prevent a peaceful punisher from destroying a replicant

defender.name: Defender
defender.description: The Defender has built-in implant protection that saves them from death
defender.abilities: The defender bypasses the first attack with their protection, but if attacked a second time, the defender dies
defender.lore: Owner of one of the most expensive implants, allows avoiding death when it's so close
defender.tips: Don't be afraid to be a target, as if they try to destroy you - you can protect yourself

abilitySides.cyberPolice: The Defender can deflect attacks onto themselves to prevent valuable players from being destroyed
abilitySides.replicants: The Defender can deflect attacks onto themselves to prevent valuable replicants from being destroyed

jammer.name: Jammer
jammer.description: Built-in implant jammer that blocks all players' private chats for the next round
jammer.abilities: The jammer blocks all players' private chats for the next round
jammer.lore: An old spy whose implant blocks all private player chats for a short time with a strong pulse
jammer.tips: Your role can both limit and increase the amount of information the city can receive

abilitySides.cyberPolice: The Jammer can increase the amount of information
abilitySides.replicants: The Jammer can limit the amount of information

behavioralExpert.name: Behavioral Expert
behavioralExpert.description: The Behavioral Expert knows how to compare player behaviors
behavioralExpert.abilities: Each night chooses 2 players, receives a hint: 'Are they from the same faction? Yes/No'.
behavioralExpert.lore: A behavior expert who can compare player behaviors
behavioralExpert.tips: Very strong information role, can break player alliances

abilitySides.cyberPolice: Helps find replicants who are gaining trust

neiroScanner.name: Neuro Scanner
neiroScanner.description: Connected to the neural network, can know how many living replicants are in the city
neiroScanner.abilities: Once per game can learn how many living replicants are in the city
neiroScanner.lore: The only one in the city who can connect to the neural network and count replicant signatures
neiroScanner.tips: Ability helps detect lies from other information roles

votingModerator.name: Voting Moderator
votingModerator.description: The Voting Moderator ensures privacy and fairness in voting
votingModerator.abilities: Receives information about who voted for whom each night
votingModerator.lore: Holder of admin rights to the voting system
votingModerator.tips: Your role helps find manipulations in voting, or hide them

abilitySides.cyberPolice: The Voting Moderator can provide additional information about suspected replicants
abilitySides.replicants: The Voting Moderator can hide information about suspected replicants
